mapper.sql: id, orgId, userId, position, createdTime, updatedTime
mapper.select: select om.id as id, om.position as role, u.nickname as nickname, up.truename as truename, up.mobile as mobile, u.email as email from org_commissioner om left join user u on om.userId = u.id left join user_profile up on u.id = up.id where om.orgId = #{orgId} limit #{current}, #{size}
